title: Blended Instructional Design Course for Strengthening Public School Teachers’ Job Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of secondary education curricula and possession of a teaching license
context.additional_context: Hybrid course combining mobile-based learning (smartphone-centric) with monthly offline workshops. Focused on job competency development based on mathematics subject-matter expertise

learning_goals: Within six months, learners can execute learner development competencies (individual learning needs analysis and personalized guidance strategy development) with over 80% accuracy
During team projects, learners can demonstrate collaboration competencies to propose educational problem-solving solutions at least three times
Based on service mindset competencies, learners can manage conflicts among parents, students, and teachers with over 85% satisfaction

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
